content.description: The Black Crows Corvus Skis are at the heart of what the iconic French ski manufacturer is all about. Defined by their unique juxtaposition of a reverse camber shape with two plates of titanal and versatile big mountain waist width, these skis are freeride chargers with a twist. They're damp, expressive, nimble, and forceful - graceful on both technical lines and cruiser resort runs. By blending serious materials with playful design cues, the Corvus is a fresh alternative to the traditional 108 charger, delivering the same aggressive performance but with a bit of free-spirited soul injected into every turn.
content.name: Black Crows Corvus Skis 2023
